movie.title: The Last Horror Film
movie.description_intro: Vinny is obsessed with famous actress Jana Bates and is determined to have her star in his movie. He travels to the Cannes Film Festival in France to try and convince her. Unfortunately, he goes about things in a rather unprofessional manner and people invloved with Jana Bates begin to disappear.

Unfortunately, he goes about things in a rather unprofessional manner and people invloved with Jana Bates begin to disappear.

movies.title: Below Sea Level
movies.summary: During a five year period an Italian filmmaker documents the world of down-on-their-luck individuals who live in a Californian desert trying to get by one day at a time. None of them has more than a vehicle, a dog and some clothes.
movies.description_full: During a five year period an Italian filmmaker documents the world of down-on-their-luck individuals who live in a Californian desert trying to get by one day at a time. None of them has more than a vehicle, a dog and some clothes.

movies.title: Red Clover
movies.summary: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.
movies.description_full: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.
movies.synopsis: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.

movies.title: Relic
movies.summary: When elderly mother Edna inexplicably vanishes, her daughter Kay and granddaughter Sam rush to their family's decaying country home, finding clues of her increasing dementia scattered around the house in her absence. After Edna returns just as mysteriously as she disappeared, Kay's concern that her mother seems unwilling or unable to say where she's been clashes with Sam's unabashed enthusiasm to have her grandma back. As Edna's behavior turns increasingly volatile, both begin to sense that an insidious presence in the house might be taking control of her. With RELIC, first-time writer/director Natalie Erika James crafts an unforgettable new spin on the haunted-house movie.

movies.title: The Stuff
movies.summary: When a mysterious, white, and gooey but delicious substance begins oozing from the Earth's surface, it makes a great new dessert product, but this new dessert has a sinister origin: it's an entity that takes over its victims' minds while making them crave more of it.
